This year’s U.S. Winter Olympic Team is a reminder that our country’s strength comes from its diversity. I’m especially proud of the 22 Californians representing us this year. Good luck @TeamUSA. I can't wait to watch you bring home the gold!

Lessons of 2017:  Cut taxes ➡️ more jobs, bonuses, and wages rise (eg, Walmart raising min to $11/hr). On the other hand, raise minimum wage ➡️ fewer jobs, hurting low-income workers the most (see also, Seattle). https://twitter.com/nationalpost/status/961962044059680768 QT @nationalpost Minimum wage hike fallout? Who at the White House knew about these allegations, and when did they know? What kind of access did he have to classified information?
